Source.Name: quakespasm
Source.Summary: A *Nix friendly Quake Engine based on the SDL port of the popular FitzQuake
Source.Description: QuakeSpasm is a modern, cross-platform Quake engine based on FitzQuake. It includes support for 64 bit CPUs and custom music playback, a new sound driver, some graphical niceities, and numerous bug-fixes and other improvements. Game data must be placed in ~/.quakespasm/id1.
